data.oai_dc:dc: Birds, Belize, Occurrence|Observation, Birds, Belize, Point Count

Point Count data collected at the property of Chaa Creek Lodge by the Foundation for Wildlife Conservation(formerly known as Birds without Borders). Data was collected from November 1997 to July 2001.|This dataset was developed based on point count data collected at Chaa Creek Lodge. The dataset includes observational data of both migrant and resident species. Having data on birds in Belize will allow information to be generated on abundance, diversity, etc.|15,615 occurrences
